level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary repeal of section, see § 515 of the Omnibus Criminal Code Amendments Emergency Amendment Act of 2012 (D.C. Act 19-599, January 14, 2013, 60 DCR 1017).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 2-107
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-107, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 3-901.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 3-24
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 3-24, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 3-903.

level.heading: References in Text
level.text: "Section 203 of the Crime Control Act," referred to in subsection (c)(1), formerly codified in 42 U.S.C. § 3723, was superseded by Pub. L. 90-351, Title I, § 203, as added December 27, 1979, 93 Stat. 1174, Pub. L. 96-157, § 2.
"Section 223 of the Juvenile Justice Act," referred to in subsection (c)(2), is codified as 42 U.S.C. § 5633.
